enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Chair Georg Børsting presented draft conclusions.
CHINA and the US preferred limiting invitations for submissions to Parties, while the EU favored also inviting submissions from admitted observers and relevant intergovernmental organizations.
The EU requested additional time for consultations.
Chair Børsting said that if no comments are received by midday Wednesday, he will consider the text agreed.
